title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
3 points maximum

Construction (3 points)

· Plotted points on (modified) bar graph

· Labeled axes with cultures and times identified

· Units and scaling
descriptions:
Student response earns none of the available points.

· Labeled axes with cultures and times identified

· Units and scaling

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
4 points maximum

Explanation (2 points)

· Cells expressing only S1 do not survive.

· Cells do not have an R protein OR have no protection (from nuclease activity).

Description (2 points)

· Culture 2/Cells with S1 and R1 survive.

· Culture 3/Cells with S1 and R2 do not survive.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
3 points maximum

Identification (2 points)

Reasoning (1 point)

· At low density cells are unlikely to come in contact with one another.

· At high density cells are more likely to come in contact with one another.

· At low densities cells do not produce enough signal/signaling molecule.
descriptions:
